channel.title: How to Make it Chnage my Prayerbook
channel.description: Ive Done Curses But How Do i make it when i click the curses altar it changes my book? Please Help its PI

item.title: How to Make it Chnage my Prayerbook
item.dc:creator: @CoderOops CoderOops
item.description:
@CoderOops wrote:

Add this into your Actionhandler.java — 411 is id of Chaos Altar, change it, if you’re using different altar.

case 411: if(c.altarPrayed == 0) { c.altarPrayed = 1; c.setSidebarInterface(5, 22500); c.startAnimation(645); c.sendMessage("You sense a surge of power flow through your body!"); c.getCombat().resetPrayers(); } else { c.altarPrayed = 0; c.setSidebarInterface(5, 5608); c.startAnimation(645); c.sendMessage("You sense a surge of purity flow through your body!"); c.getCurse().resetCurse(); } break;

Read full topic
item.source: How to Make it Chnage my Prayerbook
